documentation.author: Janet Dowell
documentation.purpose:
Calculate estimated Creatinine Clearance on inpatients and hospital based outpatients whenever a Creatinine value is reported.
Added recurring encounter 2/5/19 jkh
documentation.explanation:
Evoke: E1 = Verified or modified Creatinine Value
Logic: L1 = logic True L2 = Creatinine value verified or modified and is > 0 L3 = Most recent value for weight is > 0 L4 = Most recent value for height is > 0 L5 = calculation of IBW for males L6 = calculation of IBW for females L7 = calculation of dosing weight (DW) for males L8 = calculation of dosing weight (DW) for females L9 = check if actual weight is < IBW males L10 = check if actual weight is < IBW females L11 = check if actual weight is 20% > IBW males L12 = check if actual weight is 20% > IBW females L13 = actual weight is between IBW and IBW+20% males L14 = actual weight is between IBW and IBW+20% L15 = patients gender is male L16 = patients gender is female L17 = patients age is > 65 L18 = Creatinine value is < 0.80 L19 = patients encounter type L20 = patients age is < 18
Action: AG1 = if actual weight is < IBW, patient is > 65, Creatinine is < .8 and patient is male AG2 = if actual weight falls between IBW and IBW+20%, patient is > 65, Creatinine is < .8 and patient is male. AG3 = if actual weight is > IBW+20%, patient is >65, Creatinine is < .8 and patient is male. AG4 = if actual weight is < IBW, patient is > 65, Creatinine is < .8 and patient is female. AG5 = if actual weight falls between IBW and IBW+20%, patient is > 65, Creatinine is < .8 and patient is female. AG6 = if actual weight is > IBW+20%, patient is >65, Creatinine is < .8 and patient is female. AG7 = if actual weight is < IBW and patient is male and < 65. AG8 = if actual weight falls between IBW and IBW+20%, patient is < 65 and patient is male. AG9 = if actual weight is > IBW+20%, patient is < 65 and patient is male. AG10 = if actual weight is < IBW and patient is female and < 65. AG11 = if actual weight falls between IBW and IBW+20%, patient is < 65 and patient is female. AG12 = if actual weight is > IBW+20%, patient is < 65 and patient is female. AG13 = if actual weight is < IBW, patient is > 65, Creatinine is > .8and patient is male AG14 = if actual weight falls between IBW and IBW+20%, patient is > 65, Creatinine is > .8 and patient is male. AG15 = if actual weight is > IBW+20%, patient is > 65, Creatinine is > .8 and patient is male. AG16 = if actual weight is < IBW, patient is > 65, Creatinine is > .8 and patient is female. AG17 = if actual weight falls between IBW and IBW+20%, patient is > 65, Creatinine is > .8 and patient is female. AG18 = if actual weight is > IBW+20%, patient is > 65, Creatinine is > .8 and patient is female. AG19 = If patients age is 18, use modified Swartz Equation

statements.statement: SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC

SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.DESCRIPTION ,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
/* SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 1901 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_RESULT_STATUS
templateDefinitions.definition: a RESULT_STATUS result exists for PROCEDURE

statements.statement: SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.CODE_VALUE ,C1.DISPLAY ,C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 and cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) between c1.begin_effective_dt_tm and c1.end_effective_dt_tm ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_DEMOGRAPHIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: patient's DEMOGRAPHIC is in OPT_CODED_VALUES or city/zip code is OPT_TEXT_VALUE

column.value: County of business mailing address (Code set 74)

statements.statement: select FreeText = FillString(40, " ") from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_RESULT_CREATE
templateDefinitions.definition: Create RESULT_STATUS result RESULT for procedure PROCEDURE1 with CHART result comment COMMENT linked to PROCEDURE2

statements.statement: select t.mnemonic, t.task_assay_cd from discrete_task_assay t where t.active_ind = 1 order t.mnemonic /* select o.order_mnemonic, c.description from orders o, order_catalog c where o.catalog_cd = c.catalog_cd */

value.value: Calculated by Discern Expert using the Cockcroft-Gault formula and the patients actual weight of @result:3 because it was less than the IBW of @MISC:5. Since the patient was > 65 years of age and the Creatinine value was < 0.80mg/dL, 0.8mg/dL was substituted as the Creatinine value.

Calculated by Discern Expert using the Cockcroft-Gault formula and the patients IBW of @MISC:5. Since the patient was > 65 years of age and the Creatinine value was < 0.80mg/dL, 0.8mg/dL was substituted as the Creatinine value.

Calculated by Discern Expert using the Cockcroft-Gault formula and the patients Dosing weight of @MISC:7 because the patients actual weight is 20% > than the IBW of @MISC:5. Since the patient was > 65 years of age and the Creatinine value was < 0.80mg/dL, 0.8mg/dL was substituted as the Creatinine value.

Calculated by Discern Expert using the Cockcroft-Gault formula and the patients actual weight of @result:3 because it was less than the IBW of @MISC:6. Since the patient was > 65 years of age and the Creatinine value was < 0.80mg/dL, 0.8mg/dL was substituted as the Creatinine value.

Calculated by Discern Expert using the Cockcroft-Gault formula and the patients IBW of @MISC:6. Since the patient was > 65 years of age and the Creatinine value was < 0.80mg/dL, 0.8mg/dL was substituted as the Creatinine value.

Since the patient was > 65 years of age and the Creatinine value was < 0.80mg/dL, 0.8mg/dL was substituted as the Creatinine value.
